record.description: Iron Mask, the junior men's honorary society has selected these University of Chicago co-eds as candidates for homecoming queen. The queen will be chosen by campus vote and announced at the homecoming dance Friday night at Ida Noyes Hall. She will be presented between halves at the game with Ohio State at Stagg Field on Saturday. First row, left to right: Louise Snow, Joan Lyding, Louise Huffaker, Marjorie Shulz, Luvena Stubbs and Betty Tracy; second row: Betty Clark, Marion Elisberg, Betsy Chase, Edith Hansen, and Mary Margaret Mayer. Update: The gal crowned homecoming queen is Marion Elisberg, second from the left, second row. The other gals comprise her court of honor.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
